# Tactica DayZ Next.js Project

This is a Next.js website for Tactica DayZ, a Vanilla+ DayZ server experience.

## Project Overview
- **Framework**: Next.js 14+ with TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Purpose**: Professional gaming server website
- **Target**: DayZ community and potential players

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow Next.js best practices for performance
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Optimize for SEO and performance
- Maintain modern, clean code structure

## Content Focus
- Server information and statistics
- Community features and links
- Donation/support system
- Professional gaming aesthetic
- Mobile-first responsive design
